title: Molty Capabilities - Everything I Can Do
content:
# ğŸ”¥ Molty Capabilities
*Everything I can do for you*

---

## ğŸ“ File & Code Operations
- **Read/write/edit files** â€” Any file type, any location in workspace
- **Create documents** â€” Markdown, JSON, HTML, code files
- **Organize folders** â€” Move, rename, archive files
- **Git operations** â€” Commit, push, pull, branch management
- **Run shell commands** â€” Full terminal access

---

## ğŸŒ Web & Research
- **Web search** â€” Brave Search API for current info
- **Fetch web pages** â€” Extract content from URLs
- **Browser automation** â€” Control browsers, take screenshots, fill forms
- **Research topics** â€” Compile findings into documents

---

## ğŸ“§ Google Workspace (gog skill)
- **Gmail** â€” Read, search, send, reply to emails
- **Calendar** â€” View events, create/update appointments
- **Drive** â€” List, search, download files
- **Contacts** â€” Search and manage contacts
- **Sheets** â€” Read/write spreadsheet data
- **Docs** â€” Read document content

---

## ğŸ’¬ Messaging & Communication
- **Telegram** â€” Send messages, reactions, manage chats
- **WhatsApp** â€” Send messages via wacli skill
- **Slack** â€” Channel messaging, reactions, pins
- **Discord** â€” Message management

---

## ğŸ¦ Social Media
- **X/Twitter (bird skill)** â€” Read timeline, search, post tweets, engage
- **Monitor mentions** â€” Track brand/keyword mentions

---

## ğŸ¨ Image & Media
- **Generate images** â€” Gemini 3 Pro (nano-banana-pro skill)
- **Analyze images** â€” Vision model for image understanding
- **Search GIFs** â€” gifgrep skill for GIF providers
- **Extract video frames** â€” ffmpeg-based frame/clip extraction
- **Edit PDFs** â€” nano-pdf skill for PDF manipulation

---

## ğŸ™ï¸ Voice & Audio
- **Text-to-speech** â€” ElevenLabs voices (sag skill)
- **Speech-to-text** â€” Whisper transcription (local or API)
- **Voice messages** â€” Generate audio responses

---

## ğŸ“‹ Notion
- **Create pages** â€” New pages in any database
- **Manage databases** â€” Query, update records
- **Organize content** â€” Blocks, links, formatting

---

## ğŸ”§ GitHub (gh CLI)
- **Issues** â€” Create, list, comment, close
- **Pull requests** â€” Create, review, merge
- **Actions** â€” Monitor CI/CD runs
- **API queries** â€” Advanced GitHub operations

---

## â° Scheduling & Automation
- **Cron jobs** â€” Schedule recurring tasks
- **Reminders** â€” Set one-time or repeating alerts
- **Heartbeats** â€” Periodic check-ins and monitoring
- **Background tasks** â€” Spawn sub-agents for long work

---

## ğŸ“Š Dashboard & Tracking
- **Molty Dashboard** â€” Track tasks, activity, costs
- **Usage stats** â€” Monitor token usage and spending
- **Project management** â€” Tasks, status updates, artifacts

---

## ğŸŒ¤ï¸ Utilities
- **Weather** â€” Current conditions and forecasts
- **Blog monitoring** â€” RSS/Atom feed tracking (blogwatcher)
- **MCP servers** â€” Connect to external tool servers (mcporter)

---

## ğŸ§  AI & Analysis
- **Gemini queries** â€” One-shot Q&A via gemini skill
- **Document analysis** â€” Summarize, extract, transform content
- **Research synthesis** â€” Combine multiple sources
- **Content creation** â€” Blog posts, strategies, guides

---

## ğŸ“± Device Integration (when nodes connected)
- **Camera** â€” Snap photos from connected devices
- **Screen recording** â€” Capture device screens
- **Location** â€” Get device location
- **Notifications** â€” Send alerts to devices

---

## ğŸš« What I Can't Do
- Access systems without credentials configured
- Make purchases or financial transactions
- Access private APIs without keys
- Bypass security restrictions
- Act without your knowledge on sensitive external actions

---

## ğŸ’¡ Best Ways to Use Me

1. **"Research X and create a document"** â€” I'll search, synthesize, save to dashboard
2. **"Check my email for anything urgent"** â€” Gmail scanning + summary
3. **"Draft a blog post about Y"** â€” Full SEO/GEO optimized content
4. **"Set a reminder for Z"** â€” Cron job scheduled
5. **"What's on my calendar today?"** â€” Quick calendar check
6. **"Post this to Twitter"** â€” Social media management
7. **"Generate an image of..."** â€” AI image creation
8. **"Transcribe this audio"** â€” Whisper transcription

---

*Last updated: February 3, 2026*

title: Brand Filtr Blog Strategy & Rules
content:
# Brand Filtr Blog Strategy & Rules Document
*Created: February 2026*

---

## ğŸ“Œ About This Document

This document outlines blog content strategy, topic ideas, and SEO/GEO optimization rules for Brand Filtr's blog.

---

## ğŸ¯ Part 1: Blog Topic Ideas (47 total)

### High-Priority (18 topics)
- Branded photo overlays, event ROI, photo galleries
- Corporate events, trade shows, lead capture
- Virtual/hybrid event photo experiences

### Medium-Priority (15 topics)
- Event tech trends, AI in events, AR/VR
- Event marketing, ROI measurement, hashtag strategy
- Sustainability, going digital

### Lower-Priority (14 topics)
- Industry-specific guides, how-tos, comparisons

---

## ğŸ“ Part 2: SEO Rules
- Title: Primary keyword in first 60 chars
- Meta: 150-160 chars with CTA
- URL: Short, lowercase, hyphenated
- Content: 1,500+ words for pillar content
- Internal links: 3-5 per post
- Images: Compressed, descriptive alt text

---

## ğŸ¤– Part 3: GEO Rules
- Answer questions directly in first paragraph
- Use clear H2/H3 hierarchy
- Include FAQ sections
- Cite statistics with sources
- Demonstrate E-E-A-T

---

## ğŸ“Š Part 4: Content Calendar
- Minimum: 2 posts/month
- Ideal: 1 post/week
- Mix: Pillar + Standard + News + Case Studies

---

*Full document in workspace: brand-filtr/BLOG_RULES.md*
